parameter.name: page
parameter.description: The number of the page.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Limit the number of cases results per page.

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: The query used to search across multiple fields with a single string and is useful.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Customer's names. Comma delimited list of customer names.

parameter.name: firstName
parameter.description: Customer's first names. Comma delimited list of customer first names.

parameter.name: lastName
parameter.description: Customer's last names. Comma delimited list of customer first names.

parameter.name: customerEmail
parameter.description: Customer's email addresses. Comma delimited list of customer email addresses.

parameter.name: phone
parameter.description: Customer's phone number. Comma delimited list of customer phone numbers.

parameter.name: company
parameter.description: Customer's company names. Comma delimited list of customer company names.

parameter.name: twitter
parameter.description: Customer's Twitter screen names. Comma delimited list of customer Twitter screen names.

parameter.name: labels
parameter.description: Case labels. Comma delimited list of case labels.

parameter.name: caseIds
parameter.description: Case IDs. Comma delimited list of case IDs.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: The subject of the case.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Description of the case.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Case statuses. Comma delimited list of case statuses 'new', 'open', 'pending', 'resolved' and 'closed'.

parameter.name: priority
parameter.description: Case priorities. Comma delimited list of case priorities 1-10.

parameter.name: assignedGroup
parameter.description: Case assigned group.

parameter.name: assignedUser
parameter.description: Case assigned user 'me', 'none', 'unassigned', or name of agent.

parameter.name: channels
parameter.description: Channel types. Comma delimited list of channels 'email', 'twitter', 'chat', 'callback', 'phone'.

parameter.name: notes
parameter.description: Case notes.

parameter.name: attachments
parameter.description: Case attachments.

parameter.name: caseCustomKeyName
parameter.description: Case custom field key name.

parameter.name: caseCustomKeyValue
parameter.description: Value for the case custom field key.

parameter.name: created
parameter.description: Case created. Date range should be 'today' or 'yesterday' or 'week' or 'month' or 'year'.

parameter.name: updated
parameter.description: Case updated. Date range should be 'today' or 'yesterday' or 'week' or 'month' or 'year'.

parameter.name: changed
parameter.description: Case changed. Date range should be 'today' or 'yesterday' or 'week' or 'month' or 'year'.

parameter.name: sinceCreatedAt
parameter.description: Returns results with a Create Date (in unix time) greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified Date.

parameter.name: maxCreatedAt
parameter.description: Returns results with a Create Date (in unix time) less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified Date.

parameter.name: sinceUpdatedAt
parameter.description: Returns results with an Update Date (in unix time) greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified Date.

parameter.name: maxUpdatedAt
parameter.description: Returns results with an Update Date (in unix time) less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified Date.

parameter.name: sinceChangedAt
parameter.description: Returns results with a Change Date (in unix time) greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified Date.

parameter.name: maxChangedAt
parameter.description: Returns results with a Change Date (in unix time) less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified Date.

parameter.name: sinceId
parameter.description: Returns results with an ID greater than or equal to (that is, more recent than) the specified ID.

parameter.name: maxId
parameter.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID.

parameter.name: sortField
parameter.description: Case field on which would like to sort.

parameter.name: sortDirection
parameter.description: Direction to sort. 'asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending.
